title: Minecraft Beta 我的世界[v1.2_01]更新档
author: zx蘿卜卜
txt_content:
Minecraft Beta 我的世界 v1.2_01
台式没在, 用的是本本. 没法发完整版, 就这样将就着吧~
更新了01, 睡觉..

Minecraft Beta 1.2_01
 Fixed various blocks acting really weird when placed (rails, torches, and more) Optimized performance Added a new painting that was not added in version 1.2 Reduced spawn rates a bit Fixed a whole pile of lighting bugs No more ghosts at night Added a temporary fix to get rid of chunk visibility errors [1] Quote in Main Menu returned to normal. (No longer constantly shows the quote "Finally beta!")

Minecraft Beta 1.2
 新增加"木炭" 新增音调方块 (right click to tune, trigger to play) 新增15种羊毛颜色染料 新增加"鱿鱼"被动怪物, 会掉墨囊Ink Sack 新增新树种 (桦木, 松树) Reeds retconned into sugar canes. They still make paper. 新增合成方法(新方块的合成, 新物品的合成) 新增2种方块 (Dispenser), (Lapis Lazuli) 新增"蛋糕" Sugar - Crafted from Sugar Cane 默认熔炉有新的皮肤 骷髅弓箭手会掉骨头 骨头可以制作成骨头粉(染料材料) New gray, light gray, and black sheep. Drop correspondingly colored wool. 所有工具增强持久度 新增"沙石"Sandstone 现在蜘蛛能爬墙 Mob Spawners again show a rotating model inside of what they spawn. Wheat Seeds might be harvested more often when plowing grass blocks. Included the FastRender (aka Optimine [1]) mod by Scaevolus [2]. (Source: [3]) F2 为载图, 载图保存在 .minecraft 下的 "screenshots"文件夹
Bugs修正:
 联机中墙画能正常显示了 Disconnecting while riding no longer keeps the player in the world A bunch more state is properly synched in multiplayer Fixed colors going weird on PowerPC Fixed a horrible chunk reload loop in singleplayer Fixed most lighting bugs in newly generated SMP maps Falling sand behaves better in SMP Fixed a few crash on load level bugs Jack-O-Lantern now has correct tooltip. Sheep now visibly lose their wool when hit in SMP.

解压rar, 把bin文件夹放在.minecraft下.

Minecraft Beta 1.2_01

    Fixed various blocks acting really weird when placed (rails, torches, and more)
修复了许多物品放置时的奇怪表现（火炬，铁轨等）
    Optimized performance
改进了游戏性能
    Added a new painting that was not added in version 1.2
增加了一个新的画作
    Reduced spawn rates a bit
减少了一点刷新率（不知道是全局还是仅指怪物）
    Fixed a whole pile of lighting bugs
修复了所有的光照渲染bug
    No more ghosts at night
晚上不会有幽灵啦（哈？
    Added a temporary fix to get rid of chunk visibility errors [1]
使用了一个权宜之计解决chunk的显示错误
    Quote in Main Menu returned to normal. (No longer constantly shows the quote "Finally beta!")
主界面的吐槽恢复正常啦（不再一直显示“终于beta啦”了）



Sugar - Crafted from Sugar Cane
糖 - 由甘蔗制作（以前的芦苇

New gray, light gray, and black sheep. Drop correspondingly colored wool.
新的灰色，浅灰色，黑色羊，掉落对应颜色的羊毛（小黑羊=w=

Mob Spawners again show a rotating model inside of what they spawn.
刷怪笼子现在在里面会有个旋转的小模型表示他刷新啥

Included the FastRender
